Html:
Hi, guys, I have recently been able to deploy Java 8 Update 65 with WSUS Package Publisher. This tutorial contains Step by Step deployment Guide with Screenshots. I hope this will help you to deploy Java to clients.

You can try to follow this step by step guide with screenshots: http://www.sthshare.com/wordpress/how-to-deploy-java-to-clients-using-wsus-package-publisher.html

I hope it will help you.

How do you handle the need for the browser, e.g. Internet Explorer to be closed?

WPP aslo can deploy the Chrome, Firefox browser to clients.
WSUS Package Publisher deploy Firefox
